PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result of these merits , PSCs based on these previously reported side - chain D-A polymers exhibited a maximal PCE of 4.74% .

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 4.74% - the maximal PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) based on the previously reported side-chain D-A polymers.

So, the "Property Value" entities are:

* 4.74%
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here's the updated list of "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. 4.74% - the maximal PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) based on the previously reported side-chain D-A polymers.

The entity "4.74%" clearly refers to the value of the PCE property of the PSCs, so it is a relevant "Property Value" entity.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the table with the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.74% |

The entity "4.74%" is the maximal PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) based on the previously reported side-chain D-A polymers.
